body.description: BYD CARE 3-Ply Surgical Mask (level 2), Box of 50 PCs Single-use 3-ply surgical masks, carefully designed and engineered by the BYD R&D group, provide a soft, skin-friendly, comfortable wearing experience for all-day usage. The BYD CARE single-use 3-ply surgical masks are adjustable; put the mask over your nose and mouth and secure it under your chin. 3-Ply Construction Comfortable Ear-loops Sturdy Nose Clip Easy to use, convenient to distribute, safe to store

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BYD Care is created by BYD CO., Ltd., a publicly-traded, globally-renowned electric vehicle manufacturer with proven innovative technology for cars, buses, trucks, forklifts and rail systems. In order to help alleviate severe PPE shortages affecting hospitals and agencies across the globe, BYD has mobilized its powerful manufacturing capacity and built the world’s largest face mask manufacturing facility with daily capacity of 10 million pieces. BYD CARE 3-Ply Surgical Mask (level 2), Box of 50 PCs Single-use 3-ply surgical masks, carefully designed and engineered by the BYD R&D group, provide a soft, skin-friendly, comfortable wearing experience for all-day usage. The BYD CARE single-use 3-ply surgical masks are adjustable; put the mask over your nose and mouth and secure it under your chin. 3-Ply Construction Comfortable Ear-loops Sturdy Nose Clip Easy to use, convenient to distribute, safe to store

3-Ply Construction The mask consists of three layers of high-quality nonwoven materials: the outer and inner layers are made of polypropylene spun-bond nonwoven fabric and the middle layer is made of polypropylene melt-blown nonwoven fabric. The three-layer design provides both comforts and wearability for indoor and outdoor activities while remaining lightweight and breathable; Comfortable Ear-loops Our masks are equipped with elastic ear loops built with a polyester, nylon, and spandex blend to relieve pressure on ears and allow for extended use; Sturdy Nose Clip Our adjustable nose clip consists of a metal wire covered in plastic designed to help the mask tightly form to the nose-bridge creating the most comfortable fit and a tight seal while also helping to reduce eyeglass fog; Easy to use, convenient to distribute, safe to store One-size-fit-the-most design with adjustability to different users; 50 PCs per Box; Each 10 PCs were Individually Packed -- Easy to use, convenient to distribute, safe to store

Product Features 50pcs of masks are contained in the box, and each 10 pcs are individually wrapped for convenience, travel and distribution.Easy to breathe and comfortable to wear for day-to-day activities;One-size-fit-the-most design with adjustability to different users;3 layers of high-quality non-woven fabric: breathable materials to provide comfort;Soft and comfortable to wear;Smooth and breathable;Easy to use, convenient to distribute, safe to store. Using Scenarios and Applications BYD CARE single-use 3-ply masks are disposable, convenient-to-use for the public in a variety of scenarios, for both personal needs, public mandates and work requirements. Widely used all over the world, people can wear the masks on a day-to-day basis within indoor and outdoor environments, such as hospitals, clinics, schools, offices, public transportation, grocery stores, shopping malls, parks, restaurants, warehouses, and in the general public. Works in all seasons and in all weather conditions (foggy, windy, dusty, etc.).
Your every day work's best choice Easy to distribute in corporate office Perfect for family use A must-have for restaurants, salon, bar, shopping mall and theme park

Wearing Instructions Make sure the blue side faces outward while the white side faces toward your nose and mouth;Hold the mask by the ear loops with the colored side facing outwards and the nose bridge upwards;Place the ear loops around each ear;Bend the nose bridge to match the shape of the nose to prevent unfiltered air from entering the nasal passage;With one hand still on the nose bridge, pull the bottom of the mask snuggly under the chin extending the mask to its full length;Blow on the mask, and feel around the edges to confirm that no air escapes, if so, make adjustments;The mask is designed for single use only and should be properly disposed after use.

Product Information Product Name BYD CARE Single Use Surgical Mask Materials Polypropylene spunbond nonwoven fabric (for surgical use), polypropylene melt-blown nonwoven, metal wire with plastic covering nose clip, polyester/nylon spandex blend ear loops Product Dimension 6.89 x 3.74 inch Packaging Specification 10 pcs per bag; 5 bags per box Storage Store in a dry, clean environment with room temperature

Warnings The mask does not eliminate the risk of contracting any disease or infection;Failure to properly use and maintain this product could result in illness or even death;Only for one-time use, please destroy and dispose according to regulations after use;Please use within the validity period;DO NOT use if package is damaged;Please refer to the instructions before use;For adult use only;Store in a cool, dry, clean place away from ﬁre and contamination;Store between -20℃ and 38℃(-4°F and 100°F) with relative humidity below 80％;If the mask becomes damaged, soiled, or breathing becomes diﬃcult, leave the contaminated area and replace and reﬁt with a new mask.

Warnings The mask does not eliminate the risk of contracting any disease or infection;Failure to properly use and maintain this product could result in illness or even death;Only for one-time use, please destroy and dispose according to regulations after use;Please use within the validity period;DO NOT use if package is damaged;Please refer to the instructions before use;For adult use only;Store in a cool, dry, clean place away from ﬁre and contamination;Store between -20℃ and 38℃(-4°F and 100°F) with relative humidity below 80％;If the mask becomes damaged, soiled, or breathing becomes diﬃcult, leave the contaminated area and replace and reﬁt with a new mask.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Among the Bunch
reviews.reviewText: I tried various brands on the Amazon website. My purchases were based on user ratings and price. Buying the highest quality at the lowest price was my goal..All had familiar problems. Some were too small. Others were hard to breathe. Quality control was a problem with broken straps and metal pieces, that fell off..This product had the least issues. The only annoyance was the scratchy fabric, that produced an occasional minor itch. It was small enough to ignore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but they are super tight on face
reviews.reviewText: Nice mask but they are kind of small but they do protect you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Teachers to Hand Out
reviews.reviewText: I dunno about your school but mine bought terrible masks to give to kids. I decided to buy these. They’re a good value so they don’t cost me too much out of pocket to give out to students and they’re comfortable to wear for most days, except maybe with omicron variant or something similarly virulent. Then you want to go for N-95 or equivalent.
